data.title: Manchester-Boston Regional Airport (MHT)
data.meta_description: Manchester-Boston Regional Airport is strategically situated in the heart of New England. Located less than fifty miles north of Boston, MA and less than an hour’s drive from the region’s most popular ski areas, scenic seacoast beaches and peaceful lakefront resorts. MHT is the premier aviation gateway for the region.
data.text:
MHT Makes it Easy.

Welcome, JetBlue!

JetBlue is coming to MHT! New nonstop flights with JetBlue will launch out of MHT in January 2025 to Orlando, Fort Myers, and Fort Lauderdale. Click the link for more information, and book your trip today!

Learn More

MHT Makes it Easy.

Announcing Two New Nonstop Flights

Today we’re saying hello to two new nonstop flights from MHT! We’re excited to share that Avelo Airlines is continuing its growth at MHT with new nonstops to Lakeland International Airport and Concord-Padgett Regional Airport starting this fall.

Learn More

MHT Makes it Easy.

Breeze Airways Launches Nonstop Flights from MHT

Welcome, Breeze Airways! Breeze launched their first flights from MHT on June 14th to Charleston and Orlando. Next up, they will offer additional flights to Tampa and Fort Myers starting in the fall.

Learn More

MHT Makes it Easy.

Planning a Trip? Fly out of MHT

No matter where you’re going, you can start your journey in Manchester, New Hampshire. MHT is connecting passengers to over 250 cities, offering nonstop flights to Baltimore, Charlotte, Chicago, Orlando, Tampa, and more.

Book Now

MHT Makes it Easy.

Sun Country to Begin Service in August 2024

MHT is excited to welcome Sun Country Airlines to New Hampshire with exclusive nonstop service to Minneapolis-St.Paul International Airport (MSP) starting August 22, 2024. Read the press release to find out more information.

Learn More
